context.p: A Label is a simple-tag, used to represent a unique characteristic of a Deployment that does not fit into any other provided attribute field. A Label can be added to multiple Deployments, and any one Deployment can have multiple Labels.
Create a new Label within the PDU OSS Deployment Tracking Tool.
NOTE: This feature is available to all Users.

info.p: Click the Labels link in the navigation bar.
Click the Create new Label button.
Enter the details as shown below.
NOTE: Any restrictions on the fields are outlined.
Click the Save button, the Label will be created, and the user will be redirected back to the view page for the newly created Label.
NOTE: Label will not save if any fields are invalid (invalid fields are highlighted in red).

result.p: A New Label is created in the PDU OSS Deployment Tracking Tool.
